holes.original_proof:
by_cases h₄ : (IsCoprime (n + 7) (n + 7))
use n + 7
constructor
simp [Set.mem_insert, Set.mem_singleton_iff]
intro m hm hne
simp [Set.mem_insert, Set.mem_singleton_iff] at hm
rcases hm with (rfl | rfl | rfl | rfl | rfl | rfl | rfl | rfl | rfl | rfl)
norm_num [IsCoprime, Int.gcd_eq_right, Int.gcd_eq_left] at h₄ ⊢
try omega
try ring_nf at h₄ ⊢
try norm_num at h₄ ⊢
try omega
try ring_nf at h₄ ⊢
try norm_num at h₄ ⊢
try omega
use n + 1
constructor
simp [Set.mem_insert, Set.mem_singleton_iff]
intro m hm hne
simp [Set.mem_insert, Set.mem_singleton_iff] at hm
rcases hm with (rfl | rfl | rfl | rfl | rfl | rfl | rfl | rfl | rfl | rfl)
norm_num [IsCoprime, Int.gcd_eq_right, Int.gcd_eq_left] at h₄ ⊢
try omega
try ring_nf at h₄ ⊢
try norm_num at h₄ ⊢
try omega
try ring_nf at h₄ ⊢
try norm_num at h₄ ⊢
try omega
